text: -~ Problem 2 (3 marks) Consider the first order differential equation $y' = \cos(t) - \sin(y)$. Define the right hand side of the equation as a Python function called 2 and plot the slope field over the intervals $0 \leq t \leq 5$ and $0 \leq y \leq 5% with step size $h=0.2$ in both directions.
